snippet: Warren Taylor, 32, of Bushkill, Pa., was charged with seven crimes, including patronizing prostitutes, assault and kidnapping.
abstract: Warren Taylor, 32, of Bushkill, Pa., was charged with seven crimes, including patronizing prostitutes, assault and kidnapping.
lead_paragraph: A 32-year-old man who the police said impersonated a New York officer and extorted sex acts from prostitutes in Manhattan and Queens was arrested on Monday and charged with seven crimes, according to the police.

headline.main: Man Is Accused of Impersonating a Police Officer
